alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk and northeastern Nassau Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brookville, or over Westbury, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Levittown, Lindenhurst, Plainview, Syosset, Westbury, Babylon, Farmingdale, Hicksville, Bay Shore, Brookville, West Islip, Copiague, Bethpage, Jericho and Wyandanch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Nassau; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
